name: TowerCombo
description:
TowerCombo is a multiplayer tower defense game built for Bevy Jam #2.

The story is about a bunch of kids in a neighbourhood playing and combining every day items to make towers to protect them from the baddies across the street.

Please ask a friend if no one is around to play . Multiplayer games need a lot of attention to be able to find another opponent by luck, so please ask someone.

This was a tough jam for us as we had many problems with multiplayer, which cost us a several days. We didn't even manage to get networking in the browser, which is why there are binary downloads.

Credits

Art by Jaaaart.

Coding by gak.
